import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Navbar from "../../components/Navbar"; import Footer from "../../components/Footer"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import { toast } from "react-toastify"; import logo from "../../assets/logo.jpg"; const ShowInvoice = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const [writingDirection, setWritingDirection] = useState("ltr"); const [dialogState, setDialogState] = useState(false); const [order, setOrder] = useState([]); const [invoice, setInvoice] = useState(); const [customer, setCustomer] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const apiUrl = window.location.origin.includes("localhost") ? "http://localhost:5000/invoices" : "https://khamco-shop-backend.onrender.com/invoices"; const authKey = localStorage.getItem("jwt"); useEffect(() => { let isMounted = true; document.title = "Invoice Details - Khamco Shop"; const fetchInvoice = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get(`${apiUrl}/${id}`, { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${authKey}` }, }); if(isMounted){ } setInvoice(response.data.invoice); setLoading(false); setOrder(response.data.order); setCustomer(response.data.customer); console.log(response.data); } catch (error) { setLoading(true); setInvoice({}); toast.error(error.response?.data?.message || error.message); } }; return () => fetchInvoice(); }, [apiUrl, authKey, id]); const deleteInvoice = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const response = await axios.delete(`${apiUrl}/orders/${order._id}`, { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${authKey}` }, }); toast.success(response.data.message); navigate("/orders"); } catch (error) { toast.error(error.response?.data?.message || error.message); } }; return ( <>

); }; export default ShowInvoice;
